recordLookups.description: For any primary contact or contact role associated with an open opportunity, their status should be open opportunity. For all other contacts associated with the inactive account: if status = customer OR known OR Converted without opportunity OR BLANK, then update their status to marketing nurture. Do not update contacts in different status.
recordLookups.name: Get_Other_Contacts
recordLookups.label: Get Other Contacts

recordLookups.description: A contact role or primary contact for the won opp should have status as Customer For all contacts associated with the activated account: if known OR Converted without opportunity OR Disqualified OR Marketing Nurture OR BLANK, then update their status to Customer. Do not update contacts in different status.
recordLookups.name: Get_Other_Contacts_01
recordLookups.label: Get Other Contacts

recordUpdates.name: Contact_Status_to_Marketing_Nurture_Selectively
recordUpdates.label: Contact Status to Marketing Nurture Selectively

recordUpdates.description: For any primary contact or contact role associated with an open opportunity, their status should be open opportunity. For all contacts associated with the churned account: if status = customer OR known OR Converted without opportunity, then update their status to marketing nurture. Do not update contacts in any different status.
recordUpdates.name: Contact_Status_to_Marketing_Nurture_Selectively_02
recordUpdates.label: Contact Status to Marketing Nurture Selectively

recordUpdates.description: Should update any contact listed as contact role or primary contact to Customer Should not update other contacts associated with the account.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Collection_of_Contacts
recordUpdates.label: Update Collection of Contacts

recordUpdates.description: Should update any contact listed as contact role or primary contact to Open Opportunity Should not update other contacts associated with the account.

textTemplates.name: txt_SlackMessageUnhandledFault
textTemplates.text:
:error-triangle: *Contact Status Failure*


> *What* 

> An unhandled fault occurred.

> 

> :salesforce-2: <{!$Setup.Instance_Configuration__c.Instance_URL__c}/{!var_ErrRecordId} |View in Salesforce>

> 

> *Fault Message*

> {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

>

> *Step Name*

> {!var_StepName}

> 

> *Investigation Required*

> 1. Examine the Opportunity or Account associated to the error.

> 2. Examine the contact status on the contact(s) in scope.
